attributes.action: Make bsl one of the languages studied in schools
attributes.additional_details: Our death communities are being isolated.  If bsl was taught as a language there would be a lot more inclusion.  Bsl is as important as any other language studied in our Schools
attributes.background: In secondary schools you gave to do a language as one of your gcse's.  Most schools do French and German.  I believe British sign language should be added to the language departments at schools. And also believe bsl should be taught in primary schools too.  Bsl should be on the curriculum!
